animeDescription: Grandma is a nasty and manipulative thing most of the time, causing endless trouble for her son-in-law and daughter, her grandchildren, and her neighbours.  (Source: ANN)
animeStaff: [['Wada Kaoru', ['Music']], ['Hasegawa Machiko', ['Original Creator']], ['Kurahashi Shizuo', ['Sound Effects']], ['Nagao Hitoshi', ['Art Director']]]
